Technology.Name: Reaction Drive
Technology.LongDescription: The reaction drive channels strongly ionized plasma through a subspace field which excites and unleashes the potential energy held within. The resulting torrent can be harnessed and redicted for propulsion purposes.

UnlockedBonus.Name: Reaction Drive Upgrade
UnlockedBonus.Description: By converting all of our engines to the reaction drive standard, we can achieve 20% faster sub-light speeds and maneuverability.
